Last Powerful Ruler

During the declining period of the Gupta dynasty, Buddhagupta provided stability for some time. His empire extended from Bengal to Malwa.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Damodarpur Copper Plate: Provides evidence of his rule in Bengal (Pundravardhana).
  • Religion: Had a leaning towards Buddhism (as evident from the name).
  • Eran Pillar: Matrivishnu and Dhanyavishnu erected a flagstaff during his reign.
